src:
IIMS Motobike 2019: Diikuti 10 Brand, Tiket Dijual Rp 25 Ribu
05 Nov 2019, 07:45 by Wira Utama, Wawan Priyanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Pameran sepeda motor Indonesia International Motor Show Motobike atau IIMS Motobike akan digelar di kawasan Istoran Senayan, Gelora Bung Karno (GBK) mulai, 30 Oktober sampai 1 November 2019. Sudah ada 10 brand yang dipastikan terlibat.
"Sudah ada 10 brand yang sudah konfirmasi kesediannya," ujar Project Manager IIMS Motorbike Expo, Rudi MF di kawasan SCBD, Jakarta Selatan, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Adapun 10 brand yang dipastikan hadir dalam kegiatan tahunan ini antara lain, Vespa, Piaggio, Benelli, Cleveland, Husqvarna, Yamaha, Kawasaki, KTM, BMW Motorrad, dan Sinergi.
"Ini masih sementara, kita masih menunggu sampai hari H masih ada kejutan beberapa brand baru. Mudah-mudahan nanti ada motor elektrik," ujarnya.
Pameran ini rencanananya akan dibuka langsung oleh Presiden Joko Widodo. Sementara untuk para calon pengunjung, harga tiket masuk dipukul rata Rp 25 ribu mulai hari pertama sampai hari terakhir.
"Kami target 50 ribu orang pengunjung menghadiri IIMS Motobike 2019," ujar Rudi.
text:
IIMS Motobike 2019: Followed by 10 Brands, Tickets Sold Rp. 25 Thousand
05 Nov 2019, 07:45 by Wira Utama, Wawan Priyanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Indonesian International Motor Show Motobike or IIMS Motobike motorcycle exhibition will be held in the Istoran Senayan area, Gelora Bung Karno (GBK) from 30 October to 1 November 2019. There are already 10 brands that are definitely involved.
"There are already 10 brands that have confirmed their availability," said Project Manager of the IIMS Motorbike Expo, Rudi MF in the SCBD area, South Jakarta, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
The 10 brands that are certain to attend this annual event include Vespa, Piaggio, Benelli, Cleveland, Husqvarna, Yamaha, Kawasaki, KTM, BMW Motorrad, and Sinergi.
"This is still temporary, we are still waiting until D-day, there are still some new brand surprises. Hopefully there will be an electric motor later," he said.
The plan of the exhibition will be opened by President Joko Widodo. As for prospective visitors, the price of admission is hit an average of Rp. 25 thousand starting the first day until the last day.
"We are targeting 50 thousand visitors to attend the 2019 Motobike IIMS," said Rudi.
